jollyRoger: A skull with a cross on the forehead and curved swords behind it

keyMoments.title: Crew Faces Admiral Kizaru
keyMoments.description: The Hawkins Pirates witness their captain confronting Admiral Kizaru. Despite their pleas for Hawkins to flee, he calmly refuses based on his fortune-telling predictions.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's loyalty to their captain and their fear of the overwhelming Marine forces.

keyMoments.title: Battles Pacifista
keyMoments.description: Urouge and his crew face off against a Pacifista unit, with Urouge using his muscle expansion abilities to fight the cyborg.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the Fallen Monk Pirates confronting the Marine's advanced weaponry.

jollyRoger: A skull with an X-shaped mark and crossbones

keyMoments.title: Drake Assists Urouge
keyMoments.description: X Drake rushes to help Urouge against the Pacifista, demonstrating his formidable combat abilities.
keyMoments.significance: Shows temporary cooperation between Supernova crews against the common threat.
